title: Is it true that Lil Wayne makes his music off of the top of his head? Does he really not write down his lyrics? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes he does. I think, he has been doing that since the beginning. Drake stated in an interview that Wayne just listens to the beat for some time and sits on it. After some time, he hops in the studio killing the track. Wayne also stated in his lyrics like ‘A milli’ he says “I don’t write sh*t ‘cause I ain’t got time”. It’s all about practice. He freestyles in the booth. Rappers like Jay z do not write down the words. They just make it in their minds. I think even Tyga doesn’t write lyrics down. They freestyle when they hear the track and that’s really genius.

Yes this is true. Lil Wayne does, in fact, make his music off the top of his head. He does it extremely well and not only that but very articulately. His metaphors and similes are unmatchable considering that he has been out since the 90’s. He does not write down lyrics whatsoever. He is one of the few rappers who have not only achieved but somewhat trademarked this talent within the music industry and the hip-hop community.
